com.firebase.jobdispatcher

Class SimpleJobService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • com.firebase.jobdispatcher.JobService
        • com.firebase.jobdispatcher.SimpleJobService

  • public abstract class SimpleJobService
extends JobService
    SimpleJobService provides a simple way of doing background work in a JobService.

    Users should override onRunJob and return one of the JobResult ints.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.firebase.jobdispatcher.JobService

    • Method Detail

      • onStartJob

        public boolean onStartJob(JobParameters job)
        Description copied from class: JobService
        The entry point to your Job. Implementations should offload work to another thread of execution as soon as possible because this runs on the main thread. If work was offloaded, call JobService.jobFinished(JobParameters, boolean) to notify the scheduling service that the work is completed.

        If a job with the same service and tag was rescheduled during execution JobService.onStopJob(JobParameters) will be called and the wakelock will be released. Please make sure that all reschedule requests happen at the end of the job.

        Specified by:
        onStartJob in class JobService
        Returns:
        true if there is more work remaining in the worker thread, false if the job was completed.

      • onStopJob

        public boolean onStopJob(JobParameters job)
        Description copied from class: JobService
        Called when the scheduling engine has decided to interrupt the execution of a running job, most likely because the runtime constraints associated with the job are no longer satisfied. The job must stop execution.
        Specified by:
        onStopJob in class JobService
        Returns:
        true if the job should be retried
        See Also:
        JobInvocation.Builder.setRetryStrategy(RetryStrategy), RetryStrategy

      • onRunJob

        public abstract int onRunJob(JobParameters job)
